feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain late this morning and early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
